text: Words empty as the wind are best left unsaid.
author: Homer

text: It is our moral obligation to give every child the very best education possible.
author: Desmond Tutu

text: Success has a simple formula: do your best, and people may like it.
author: Sam Ewing

text: Loving a child doesn't mean giving in to all his whims to love him is to bring out the best in him, to teach him to love what is difficult.
author: Nadia Boulanger

text: To all the positions, I just bring the determination to win. Me being an unselfish player, I think that can carry on to my teammates. When you have one of the best players on the court being unselfish, I think that transfers to the other players.
author: LeBron James
